feature: Plone REST API Agent Skills Enhancement
workflow_rationale: Creating comprehensive documentation-based skills by extending existing skill content to cover ALL Plone REST API documentation chapters. This is feature work that enhances existing functionality without infrastructure changes.

phases.name: Documentation Research
phases.description: Use btca to fetch and catalog ALL Plone REST API documentation chapters, identifying gaps in current skill coverage

subtasks.description: Fetch complete Plone REST API Usage chapters index using btca

verification.instructions: Verify btca returned comprehensive list of Usage chapters from ploneRestapi docs

subtasks.implementation_notes: Run: btca ask -r ploneRestapi -q 'List all Usage chapters and sections in the documentation with their topics'

subtasks.description: Fetch complete Plone REST API Endpoints chapters index using btca

verification.instructions: Verify btca returned comprehensive list of all documented @-endpoints

subtasks.implementation_notes: Run: btca ask -r ploneRestapi -q 'List all REST API endpoints (@-endpoints) documented with their HTTP methods and descriptions'

subtasks.description: Create gap analysis document comparing current skills to official docs

verification.instructions: Gap analysis identifies specific missing endpoints, patterns, or examples

subtasks.expected_output: List of: (1) Missing endpoints, (2) Missing backend patterns, (3) Missing client examples

phases.name: Backend Skill Enhancement
phases.description: Enhance plone-restapi-backend skill with any missing patterns from official documentation

subtasks.description: Fetch detailed backend service patterns from official docs using btca

verification.instructions: Verify detailed patterns for services, adapters, and ZCML retrieved

subtasks.implementation_notes: Query btca for: custom services, content negotiation, permission handling, traversal, JSON schema

subtasks.description: Update backend SKILL.md with any missing service patterns

verification.expected: Number of sections should be >= current count

subtasks.implementation_notes: Add sections for any missing patterns identified in research phase

subtasks.description: Update backend reference.md with additional advanced examples

verification.expected: Number of examples should be >= 7 (current count)

subtasks.implementation_notes: Add examples for any advanced patterns not yet covered

phases.name: Client Skill Enhancement
phases.description: Enhance plone-restapi-client skill with any missing endpoints and client patterns from official documentation

subtasks.description: Fetch detailed endpoint documentation for all @-endpoints using btca

verification.instructions: Verify comprehensive endpoint details including parameters, request/response formats

subtasks.implementation_notes: Query btca for each endpoint category: auth, content, search, workflow, admin, etc.

subtasks.description: Update client SKILL.md endpoint tables with any missing endpoints

verification.expected: Number of @-endpoints in tables should match official docs count

subtasks.implementation_notes: Add any missing endpoints to appropriate category tables

subtasks.description: Add JavaScript/TypeScript examples for any new endpoints

verification.expected: JavaScript code blocks cover major endpoint categories

subtasks.implementation_notes: Ensure every major endpoint category has JS/TS usage example

subtasks.description: Add Python examples for any new endpoints

verification.expected: Python code blocks cover major endpoint categories

subtasks.implementation_notes: Ensure every major endpoint category has Python usage example

subtasks.description: Update client reference.md with additional advanced patterns

verification.instructions: Reference file contains comprehensive advanced examples for TypeScript, frameworks, and CLI

subtasks.implementation_notes: Add any advanced client patterns not yet covered (e.g., retry logic, caching, webhooks)

phases.name: Verification and Cleanup
phases.description: Verify completeness against official documentation, ensure no btca references, and validate code syntax

subtasks.description: Verify no btca references in skill files
subtasks.implementation_notes: Critical constraint - btca must not appear in final skill content

subtasks.description: Verify YAML frontmatter is valid in all SKILL.md files
subtasks.implementation_notes: Each SKILL.md must have opening and closing --- for YAML frontmatter

subtasks.description: Verify endpoint coverage completeness against official documentation

verification.instructions: Compare skill endpoint tables against official Plone REST API docs - all endpoints should be covered

subtasks.implementation_notes: Final completeness check using btca to verify no endpoints missed

subtasks.description: Review code examples for syntax correctness

verification.instructions: Visually review Python and JavaScript code blocks for syntax errors, missing imports, incomplete examples

subtasks.implementation_notes: Ensure all code examples are complete, runnable, and follow established patterns

parallel_groups.reason: Both depend only on phase-1-research, modify different files

parallelism.speedup_estimate: 1.5x if using 2 workers for phases 2 and 3

summary.startup_command: N/A - Documentation project, no services to start

acceptance_criteria: All Plone REST API endpoints documented in skill files
Both JavaScript/TypeScript AND Python examples for major categories
No btca references in final skill content
Valid YAML frontmatter in all SKILL.md files

verification_steps.name: YAML Frontmatter Check
verification_steps.expected_outcome: All files start with valid YAML frontmatter

verification_steps.name: Endpoint Table Coverage
verification_steps.expected_outcome: Comprehensive endpoint count matching official docs

verification_strategy.reasoning: Low risk documentation project - verification focuses on completeness and structural integrity rather than functional testing

unit_tests.reason: Documentation project - no executable code to test

e2e_tests.reason: No user flows - documentation reference material

browser_verification.reason: Documentation viewed in code editor, not browser
